alternativeNames: Knyasev, M.A.; Knyasev, M.S.; Knjasev, M.S.; Kniazev, M.S.; Knyazev, M.S.
comments: The published name “M.C. Knyasev” (in Russian) wrongly transliterated as “M.A. Knyasev” (in Bot. Zhurn. (Moscow & Leningrad) 100(2): 122. 2015); corrected to: “M.S. Knyasev”
examples: Thymus talijevii subsp. rotundatus (Klokov) M.S. Knyazev in P.L. Gorchakovskii  et al., Opred. Sosud. Rast. Sredn. Urala: 377 (1994).
source: IK db. 'Knjasev' spelling from Bot. Zhurn., 84(9): 113-122 (1999).  First names from Alexey Seregin.
